title: Desert people
creator_credit: Ian Dunlop, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Scenes typical of the daily life of the Pintubi tribe in the Western Desert cultural area, showing two families: the first was filmed as they were found living in desert conditions, the second had recently settled at Warburton Mission and demonstrated how they had lived a few months earlier. (A shorter version of People of the Australian Western Desert, Pts. l, 2 and 4.)
